BugInstance.message: Primitive value is boxed and then immediately unboxed in com.cts.rabo.file.helper.FileHandlingHelper.setTransactionStatus(TransactionRecord)
Found reliance on default encoding in com.cts.rabo.file.helper.FileHandlingHelper.getTransactionRecordsfromCSV(byte[]): new java.io.InputStreamReader(InputStream)
Found reliance on default encoding in com.cts.rabo.file.helper.FileHandlingHelper.getTransactionRecordsfromXML(byte[]): new String(byte[])
